categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Saulis Pau was a male individual who served in the Imperial Army. However, after suffering extensive injuries he was discharged from the army and was fitted with extensive cybernetic replacement body parts. He later became a bounty hunter, taking contracts exclusively on the behalf of the Galactic Empire. He was available for contract in Feris City and on one occasion he performed an assignment for Governor Heas. Pau was proficient in the use of a variety of different types of weapon and explosives.
